g.text: SW Layer that abstracts HW resources
to enable the execution of different
VMs on the same physical machine
Executed on top of an existing OS
Guest OS or apps run unmodified
Ability to isolate or limit the impact
disk) of a virtual domain on the performance
A task must not cause serious delays to other
tasks in a different virtual domain
ability to isolate code and data between virtual
domains and between virtual domains and hosts.
A task must not be able to alter private data
belonging to other tasks, including devices
Prevents the propragation of faults from
one virtual domain to another that could
cause blockages or stop the whole system
Virtual domain, with its own virtual
Similar to traditional processes of an OS
Not an VM (no emulation of the physical HW)
Lighter (in comparison to full and paravirtualization)
